readable.title: 3399843227_3b9d2a8dbf
readable.content: A guy and girl having their photo taken . A man holding a drink is being hugged by a woman wearing a black shirt . A man holding a drink poses with a woman . A tattooed man posing with a woman carrying a yellow handbag . A woman with dyed blonde and brown hair has her arm around the man who is holding a cup .
